<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">TensorPrimitives 与 Tensor</span></h4>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">TensorPrimitives</strong>：方法从 40 个扩展至近 200 个，支持类似 <code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Math</code> 和 <code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">INumber&lt;T&gt;</code> 的数值操作，面向跨度（span）数据。新增 SIMD 优化提升性能，泛型重载支持实现特定接口的任意类型 <code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">T</code>。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">**Tensor**：基于 <code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">TensorPrimitives</code>，提供高效数学运算，支持与 ML.NET、TorchSharp、ONNX Runtime 等 AI 库的无复制互操作。提供索引和切片等高效数据操作，在 .NET 9 中为实验性功能。</section>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">ML.NET</span></h4>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">ML.NET 4.0 增强了 AI 开发体验：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">新增 MLContext 编程配置选项。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">支持以流（Stream）加载 ONNX 模型。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">改进 DataFrame 功能。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">新增 tokenizer 支持。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">（实验性）TorchSharp 移植 Llama 和 Phi 模型家族。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">（实验性）CausalLM 管道 API。</section>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">Tokenizers</span></h4>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Microsoft.ML.Tokenizers</code> 库为文本编码和解码提供支持，适用于 AI 场景中的上下文管理、成本计算和预处理。新版本支持多种模型：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Tiktoken</strong>：支持 GPT（3、3.5、4、4o、o1）和 Llama3。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Llama</strong>：基于 SentencePiece，支持 Llama 和 Mistral。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">CodeGen</strong>：支持代码生成模型如 codegen-350M-mono。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Phi2</strong>：基于 CodeGen，支持 Microsoft Phi2。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">WordPiece 及 Bert</strong>：支持 Bert 模型如 optimum--all-MiniLM-L6-v2。</section>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6. .NET AI 主要工具和库的比较</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">以下表格列举了 .NET 中常用的 AI SDK 和库，比较了它们的特点、适用场景和优缺点：</p>
<section class="table-container" style="overflow-x: auto; padding: 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<table style="display: table; text-align: left">
<thead>
<tr>
<th style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(240, 240, 240, 1); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; min-width: 85px; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">工具/库</th>
<th style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(240, 240, 240, 1); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; min-width: 85px; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">特点</th>
<th style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(240, 240, 240, 1); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; min-width: 85px; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">适用场景</th>
<th style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(240, 240, 240, 1); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; min-width: 85px; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">优缺点</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; border-image: initial; border: 0">
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">ML.NET</strong></td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">易用，与 .NET 集成紧密</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">自定义机器学习模型</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">优点：简单易用；缺点：功能有限</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(248, 248, 248, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Azure AI SDK</strong></td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">丰富的云端 AI 服务</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">云端 AI 功能集成</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">优点：功能强大；缺点：依赖网络</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">TensorFlow.NET</strong></td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">支持 TensorFlow 模型</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">深度学习应用</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">优点：灵活性高；缺点：学习曲线陡峭</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(248, 248, 248, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">CNTK</strong></td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">强大的深度学习工具包</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">复杂深度学习任务</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">优点：性能优异；缺点：文档不足</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Accord.NET</strong></td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">专注于图像和音频处理</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">图像识别、音频分析</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">优点：专业性强；缺点：社区较小</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</section>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">这些工具各有侧重，开发者可根据项目需求选择合适的工具。例如，ML.NET 适合快速原型开发，而 TensorFlow.NET 更适合需要深度学习的高级应用。</p>
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">7. 开发实践和案例</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">AI 应用开发流程</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在 .NET 中开发 AI 应用通常包括以下步骤：</p>
<ol style="list-style-type: decimal; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">需求分析</strong>：明确 AI 任务，如预测、分类或生成内容。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">数据准备</strong>：收集数据并进行清洗和预处理。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">模型选择和训练</strong>：选择算法并训练模型。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">模型评估</strong>：测试模型性能并调整参数。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">部署和集成</strong>：将模型部署到生产环境并集成到应用中。</section>
</li>
</ol>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">应用案例</span></h3>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">自然语言处理</strong>：使用 Azure Cognitive Services 分析客户评论的情感，帮助企业优化服务。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">图像识别</strong>：使用 ML.NET 训练一个模型，识别生产线上的缺陷产品。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">……</section>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">8. 社区和学习资源</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">学习资源</span></h3>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">官方学习资源</span></h4>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Microsoft Learn</strong>：提供从入门到高级的 AI 教程，如 <a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/dotnet/ai/dotnet-ai-ecosystem" rel="noopener nofollow">dotnet-ai-ecosystem</a>。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">ai-samples</strong>：https://github.com/dotnet/ai-samples/tree/main/src/microsoft-extensions-ai-evaluation/api</section>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">GitHub</span></h4>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">GitHub 上的 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">dotnet-ai-resources</code> 仓库是一个宝贵的资源集合，包含了与 .NET AI 开发相关的库、工具和示例。</p>
<h5 style="display: block; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block">主要内容</span></h5>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">推荐库</strong>：如 OllamaSharp、AutoGen.NET、Azure AI Inference SDK 等。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">示例项目</strong>：提供从简单分类到复杂深度学习的代码示例。</section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">学习资源</strong>：官方文档和社区教程的链接。</section>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">开发者社区</span></h3>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(5, 107, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">SciSharp Stack</span></h4>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">地址</strong>：<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">https://scisharp.github.io/SciSharp/</code></section>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">.NET AI 社区活跃度高，也会举办技术研讨会，开发者可以通过关注社区动态，积极参加这些活动以获取最新动态和技术支持。</p>
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">9. 未来趋势和展望</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">AI 技术的发展趋势</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">AI 技术正向深度学习、生成式 AI 和强化学习等方向发展。这些趋势要求更高的计算能力和更灵活的开发工具。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.NET 在 AI 领域的机遇</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">scisharpstack.org 随着 .NET 生态的完善，开发者可以利用其跨平台能力和丰富工具集，在 AI 领域占据一席之地。掌握 .NET AI 技能将为职业发展带来更多机会。</p>
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">10. 总结</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">.NET 作为一个强大的开发平台，在 AI 领域提供了丰富的工具和资源。从 ML.NET 的本地机器学习到 Azure AI 的云端能力，到 Semantic Kernel 的创新应用，再到 Microsoft.Extensions.AI 的统一集成，.NET 开发者拥有构建智能应用的全部必要工具。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">随着 .NET 9 的发布，其在 AI 开发中的功能将进一步提升。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">开发者应该深入探索 .NET AI 生态，积极参与社区活动，并开始构建自己的 AI 项目。</p>
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">11. 参考文献</span></h2>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/dotnet/ai/dotnet-ai-ecosystem" rel="noopener nofollow">Microsoft Learn: .NET AI Ecosystem</a></section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://github.com/dotnet/ai-samples" rel="noopener nofollow">ai-samples</a></section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/dotnet/ai/ai-extensions" rel="noopener nofollow">Microsoft Learn: AI Extensions</a></section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://github.com/jmatthiesen/dotnet-ai-resources" rel="noopener nofollow">GitHub: dotnet-ai-resources</a></section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/whats-new/dotnet-9/overview" rel="noopener nofollow">What's new in .NET 9</a></section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://groovetechnology.com/blog/technologies/ai-for-net-developers/" rel="noopener nofollow">Groove Technology: AI for .NET Developers</a></section>
</li>
<li>
<section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"><a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://www.restack.io/p/ai-libraries-knowledge-answer-ai-libraries-csharp-cat-ai" rel="noopener nofollow">Restack: AI Libraries for C#</a></section>
</li>
</ul>
</section>
</div>

</p>
</div>
